text: The 1956–57 European Cup was the second season of the European Cup. The competition was won by Real Madrid, who beat Fiorentina 2–0 in the final at the Santiago Bernabéu Stadium, Madrid, on May 30, 1957. ==Preliminary round== Pot 1 Eastern Europe Pot 2 North-Western Europe Pot 3 South-Central Europe Drawn Match 1 Slovan UNV Bratislava Nice Porto Drawn Match 1 CWKS Warsaw AGF Aarhus Athletic Bilbao Drawn Match 2 Galatasaray Anderlecht Borussia Dortmund Drawn Match 2 Dinamo București Manchester United Spora Luxembourg Byes Byes Budapest Honvéd Rangers Fiorentina Byes Byes Rapid Wien Norrköping Grasshopper Byes Byes CDNA Sofia Rapid JC Red Star Belgrade |} ==First round== |} 1 Second leg played at Heysel Stadium, Brussels ==Quarter- finals== |} ==Semi-finals== |} ===First leg=== \---- ===Second leg=== Fiorentina won 1–0 on aggregate \---- Real Madrid won 5–3 on aggregate ==Final== ==Top scorers== The top scorers from the 1956–57 European Cup (including preliminary round) were as follows:1956/57 European Champion Clubs' Cup -
